alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 5:02PM EDT until July 09 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL BERRIEN...LANIER AND NORTHEASTERN LOWNDES COUNTIES... At 502 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Alapaha to near Mayday, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Lakeland, Ray City, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Naylor, Courthouse, Berrien Co A/P, Greenwood, Barretts, Hansell, Bannockburn, Allenville, Weber, Stockton and Teeterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
